subject: Inquiry regarding Pro X Ultra Pedals - Adjustability, Mounting, and Shipping
description_text:
Dear Simagic Team,

I am interested in purchasing the *Pro X Ultra* pedals and have a few
questions regarding their features, mounting, and shipping before placing
my order.

   1.

   *Brake Pedal:* Regarding the brake pedal, *can the spring/elastomer be
   adjusted or completely removed* for fine-tuning purposes?
   2.

   *Mounting:* If I order the pedals *with the base plate*, will it be
   easily compatible with my current chassis mounting points, or should I be
   advised to order them *without* the plate?
   3.

   *Shipping:* I see an estimated *shipping date around December 21st*.
   Could you please confirm if this is the expected dispatch date?

Thank you in advance for your assistance and prompt reply.

Best regards,

Pau Espina Cueto.

conversations.body_text: Hi Pau Espina,    The brake pedal allows for easy adjustment and replacement of springs/elastic components for fine-tuning purposes .  You can order pedals with base plates, which is more cost-effective than purchasing them separately. Please refer to these dimensions to ensure compatibility with your equipment.  Which country are you in? You can place orders on our official website, and we ship all items immediately.

Hello,

I'm living in Spain. How long does the delivery take? Regarding the pedal
plate, I'm wondering if I can attach your plate to the one I already have.
I've uploaded a picture of the plate.

Thanks for your attention.

Pau Espina Cueto.



El mar, 25 nov 2025, 3:40, service@simsonn.com

Hi Pau Espina,    We will ship from our German warehouse, with an estimated delivery time of 3-5 days. We regret that we cannot determine whether our pedals will fit your existing base plate. You can check the pedal dimensions diagram to assess compatibility.
